title: Hang Down Your Head Tom Dooley
lyrics: Hang down your head, Tom Dooley Hang down your head and cry.
Hang down your head, Tom Dooley Poor boy, you're bound to die.
Hang down your head, Tom Dooley Hang down your head and cry
Hang down your head, Tom Dooley Poor boy, you're bound to die.
Hanging from a wild oak tree.
